data.title: Italian fashion brands available at Fiumicino Airport

data.text:
What springs to mind when we think of something quintessentially Italian? We might think of excellent coffee or delicious pasta, but it’s impossible to forget Italian fashion and the clothes made in Italy. With a rich and long history as leaders in the fashion industry, Italy boasts some of the most prestigious and well-loved names in high fashion.

Clothing that is made in Italy is the epitome of style, prestige and understated elegance. So, it comes as no surprise that Italian clothing brands are some of the most loved all around the world, with some of the most recognizable high fashion brand names on the market.

Fiumicino Airport as an international fashion hub

Whether you are looking for women’s clothing made in Italy or fantastic Italian menswear brands you are sure to find what you’re looking for. Fiumicino airport is the busiest airport in Italy and offers a unique shopping experience for travellers. Once through security, you can explore a huge range of different Italian fashion stores ranging from affordable Italian clothing brands to Italian luxury clothing brands. Let’s take an in-depth look at the different available brands while on your travels. What better way to end a stay in Rome than by treating yourself to something special?

Find out more about Shop&Fly: book your products online and pick up at the airport with 10% off on online order*

A guide to the top fashion brands at Fiumicino Airport

At Fiumicino airport there are an enormous amount of clothing shops including some of the top fashion brands in Italy. And its not just for ladies, as Italian men’s clothing brands are also widely available. Housing some of the most luxurious and emblematic made in Italy clothing brands, makes it not only an international transport hub but a luxurious shopping destination. Let’s delve in to a few of them:

-Gucci: one of the most famous Italian, worldwide-known brand, an icon of the Italian dolce vita period. Here you can purchase women’s clothing as well as it being a men’s Italian brand.

-Valentino: founded in 1960 in Rome, it gained popularity for going against the psychedelic colours of the time, with stylish nudes.

-Fendi: starting out as a fur and leather shop in 1925 this luxury brand extended into perfumes as well as eyewear and clothing.

-Prada: specializing in leather handbags, belts, and travel accessories. The perfect way to travel in style!

-D&G: specializing in ready-to-wear, handbags, eyewear, and cosmetics.

-Cucinelli: accessories brand, offering affordable luxury handbags, small leather goods and accessories as well as being a very well-established Italian garment brand.

-Moncler: a luxury fashion house offering ready-to-wear garments that started out as a down jacket boutique. It has now expanded to raincoats, jackets, windbreakers and knitwear among other products.

-MaxMara: ready-to-wear Italian clothing known for its luxurious coats has now expanded into other fashion items including dresses, and shoes.

These are just some of the big names available at Fiumicino Airport for you to peruse while you wait to jet off.

Personal shopping service available at Fiumicino Airport

Perhaps you have already found the perfect Italian polo shirt and want to make sure it’s available at the airport in your size and colour when you arrive.

With the free Personal Shopper service, you can select your desired Italian wear brand product days before your flight and buy it in store on the day of your departure. So, you won’t be disappointed and it’s so easy!

The future of Italian fashion

The Italian fashion industry has for decades been synonymous with cutting edge elegance and haute couture. As well as this, these days, it is being increasingly recognized for its commitment to sustainable fashion. Fashion brands are tracking the environmental impact their production has on the planet while staying stylish. It’s a win win!

Fiumicino airport has recently added some new contenders to the list of shops available such as the brands Golden Goose and Twinset, who, although less well known that the above-mentioned brands, are luxury brands worth a visit. Other big names available are Camicissima Pinko, Boggi, Diesel , and many more.

Italian fashion brands are world renowned for their style and their elegance. You can take a bit of that home with you from Fiumicino airport where you can enjoy a complete and enjoyable retail experience, it’s more like a shopping mall than an airport terminal!
